sentence: This short 3day vacay was my first RC experience as well as my first St Thomas visit
We were granted a late check out and enjoyed every aspect of our stay water sports fitness center pool are all fantastic
They brought my vision to life beautifully and I could not have had a better experience with them
Thank you for the most amazing experience
We booked club level and this was one of the better club level food service we have experienced
Every staff member is part of Ritz experience where they greet you on the pathways are always extremely friendly and helpful
Because of my multiple positive experiences at your properties I hope my relationship with Ritz Carlton Mariot will not come to an end after this trip as I have planned
We did not miss the pool with the beautiful setting and the great staff
We did a day trip to St John which is worthwhile to experience more beautiful beaches
Everyone was so polite and nice made us feel just like family We had a blast and the best memories
Everyone else in the island seemed to be so sad and hating their jobs awful experience
Never had a similar experience and Expedia not the hotel want to take responsibility
The deception is that it is marketed as 5 star resort but not providing the luxury experience worth the 5 star price point you will pay
People spend hard earned money to vacation and should be pleased with the experience
Plenty to do with in town dining though that scene is still in recovery mode
I can promise this experience will indeed stay with me and it will not be a positive memory
Two weeks prior to arrival we were informed that finishing touches to the resort were being applied but not to worry as they would be kept away from our experience
I have difficulty even considering this experience average
If I had never experienced another Ritz Carlton Club before I would probably think this was OK but not worth the money
The facilities are not renovated or otherwise complete which limits one ’s overall experience
